Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.CGC

Class CGC3Test

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.CGC.CGC3Test
public class CGC3Test extends Object
test to check the correct behaviour of CGC3 with all the possible scenarios

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CGC3Test()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createCardTest()
    Test createCardTest creates an instance of CGC3 and checks if all parameters are correct.
    void
    emptyShelfTest()
    Test emptyShelfTest checks that the card is not accepted when the shelf is empty.
    void
    failTest()
    Test failTest checks that checkConditions returns 0 when the X shape has one couple at its center that differs from the others.
    Shelf
    getTestShelf()
    getTestShelf method returns the shelf used for the tests.
    void
    setUp()
    Method setUp creates a new shelf, a new ArrayList of tiles and a new CGC3 before each test.
    void
    xTest1()
    Test xTest1 checks if an X shape with all couples of the same tile type is correctly identified.
    void
    xTest2()
    Test xTest2 checks if an X shape with all couples of the same tile type is correctly identified when inside a 3x3 square with all of its couples of the same tile type.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach public void setUp()
      Method setUp creates a new shelf, a new ArrayList of tiles and a new CGC3 before each test.

    • createCardTest

      @Test public void createCardTest()
      Test createCardTest creates an instance of CGC3 and checks if all parameters are correct.

      Test emptyShelfTest checks that the card is not accepted when the shelf is empty.

    • xTest1

      @Test public void xTest1()
      Test xTest1 checks if an X shape with all couples of the same tile type is correctly identified.

    • xTest2

      @Test public void xTest2()
      Test xTest2 checks if an X shape with all couples of the same tile type is correctly identified when inside a 3x3 square with all of its couples of the same tile type.

    • failTest

      @Test public void failTest()
      Test failTest checks that checkConditions returns 0 when the X shape has one couple at its center that differs from the others.
